gen:link.msg:message: `AccruedIncome` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E3_AccruedIncome')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E3_AccruedIncome return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E3_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E3_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E3_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E3_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReceivablesOtherCurrent` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ReceivablesOtherCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ReceivablesOtherCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfReceivablesOtherCurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfReceivablesOtherCurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfReceivablesOtherCurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfReceivablesOtherCurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Receivables` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_Receivables')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_Receivables return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfReceivablesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfReceivablesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfReceivablesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownMaturityCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfReceivablesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
